name: Legacy of the Void Mission 2.5: Interlude Cinematic
shortName: Legacy of the Void Mission 2.5: Interlude Cinematic
description:
This is the first cinematic in Legacy of the Void, taking place right after mission 2. I used the terrain from the HotS mission Enemy Within to make it look as if they're inside a Protoss building. Mission 3 will come in time. Enjoy!

![http://www.sc2mapster.com/thumbman/images/54/677/600x349/Untitled.jpg.-m1.png](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/thumbman/images/54/677/600x349/Untitled.jpg.-m1.png>)
author: _ForgeUser4468584
